name: youtube-automator
description:
This project helps in automation of taking screenshots of a youtube video being played and automatically compile them in word document in series of their capture. It gives you several options to take screenshots, the available options currently are
* Take SS of a given video link * COMMAND : `node youtube -l "Link_Of_The_Video" Time_Interval_Between_SS` * Take SS of a whole playlist of videos * COMMAND : `node youtube -p "Link_Of_The_Playlist" Time_Interval_Between_SS` * If you aren't sure about which video to pick, you can simply enter the search you want to make, just like a normal youtube search, it will automatically go to YouTube and search for the given keywords and bring back the SS of the 1st video. * COMMAND : `node youtube -s "Search_Anything" Time_Interval_Between_SS`
